records.text: I wondered why they hired Dafne Keen for a smaller role in this one after His Dark Materials; I kinda get it this episode (though sadly this is probably it for her).At the same time I think that this show has some of the worst fight choreography I've seen in a Star Wars product recently. It's giving Heart of Darkness vibes, which works with the tone of the show (and seems to be the point of this ep), but also missing the flourishes that make Jedi fighting what it is.
